scripts.start: if [ "`node --version`" != "v0.10.38" ] ; then echo "Change your node version to v0.10.38.  ( n v0.10.38 )"; else echo "correct version of node.js installed"; if [ ! -d "node_modules" ] ; then echo 'installing packages'; npm install . ; fi; echo 'node_modules installed'; echo 'starting server'; broccoli serve; fi
scripts.build_coffee: mkdir -p ./tmp; rm -r ./tmp; mkdir -p ./build_coffee; rm -r ./build_coffee/; ONLY_COFFEE=coffee broccoli build build_coffee
scripts.build_prod: mkdir -p ./build_prod; rm -r build_prod/; BROCCOLI_ENV=production broccoli build build_prod
scripts.clean: for i in coffee dev prod tmp; do npm run "clean_$i"; done;
scripts.clean_all: npm run clean_node_modules; npm run clean;
scripts.port_clobber: lsof -i tcp:4200 || echo 'ports are not being clobbered'
scripts.postinstall: for i in build_coffee build_dev build_prod clean; do npm run "$i"; done;
